title: A charming 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom single family home
description: This is a charming 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom single family row home featuring central air, in-unit laundry, private outdoor space, and recessed lighting throughout. Enter into the living room with hardwood floors, a ceiling fan, and a bay window for your plants! Exposed spiral duct work and a green accent wall elevate the space and follow you into the dining room, separated by the carpeted staircase. Your dining area is spacious with ample room for a large dining set and a ceiling fan for year-round comfort. There's a full bathroom equipped with beautiful tiling, a vanity for storage, and a shower stall. The space flows nicely back into the eat-in kitchen boasting tile flooring, wood cabinetry, and gorgeous stained glass cabinets for additional storage space. Upstairs, the fully carpeted 2nd Floor offers 2 spacious bedrooms and another full bathroom between. The 1st bedroom is painted a soft light green with 2 windows, a built-in shelf, and good closet space. Bathroom features include a lighted vanity, a mosaic tiled shower stall with detachable shower head, and lovely blue walls that perfectly accent the blue tiling. Your 2nd bedroom is large and bright, offering tons of room for a king sized bed. There's a sizable back patio with raised flower beds and great space for a grill and patio furniture. You'll also have an unfinished basement for additional storage space and your in-unit washer and dryer.

The Versailles Philadelphia is a historic, 1920s-era residential building that has been upgraded for the contemporary age, now featuring 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom Philadelphia apartments for rent in Rittenhouse. title: Community Lounge, Bike storage, On-site Parking
description:
N Broad St, Philadelphia, PA 19123Welcome to Mily on Green. Designed for community, flexibility, and functionality, your new home offers spacious 2- and 3-bedroom apartments with high-end appliances, an in-unit washer/dryer, and built-in storage. You’ll find beautiful amenities right outside your door, including a second floor lounge ideal for working parents. Divided into several separate but interconnected spaces, the lounge offers room for coworking, family time, and group gatherings, along with a dedicated space for children and playtime. For a breath of fresh air, head up to the expansive rooftop deck. There you’ll find a cozy indoor lounge that looks out onto the 9,700 square foot green roof, complete with a variety of seating perfect for gazing onto city views or taking in the lush rooftop landscaping. title: 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment boasts modern amenities
description:
Welcome to 90 E Laurel St #B, a stunning bilevel apartment located in the highly sought-after Northern Liberties neighborhood of Philadelphia. This 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment boasts modern amenities and a prime location for an unbeatable rental experience. The open floor plan and stylish finishes create a bright and airy feel throughout the space, making it perfect for those who value comfort and style. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and plenty of cabinet space, while the living area is perfect for entertaining guests or simply relaxing after a long day. Both bedrooms are generously sized and located on separate levels for added privacy, with ample closet space for all your storage needs. In addition, this unit comes with off-street parking and in-unit laundry, making daily life more convenient and enjoyable. The rooftop deck is one of the highlights of this apartment, providing stunning views of the city skyline. Whether you want to soak up the sun, enjoy a meal al fresco, or simply relax with friends and family, the rooftop provides the perfect setting. The in-unit washer and dryer also add to the convenience and comfort of living at 90 E Laurel St #B. The Northern Liberties neighborhood is known for its vibrant atmosphere, with some of the best restaurants, shops, and entertainment that the city has to offer. With a Walk Score of 97, daily errands are a breeze and public transportation options are easily accessible. You'll never run out of things to do in this bustling neighborhood, whether you want to explore

title: Welcome to the Phoenix - Philadelphia's Premier Luxury Condominium
description:
Welcome to the Phoenix - Philadelphia's Premier Luxury Condominium. Located at 1600 Arch Street in the heart of Center City Philadelphia, Unit 1010 is an exceptional studio apartment with premium finishes and fixtures. The apartment contains a washer/dryer, dishwasher, ample pantry space, two closets, hardwood flooring, a high ceiling, and a modernized kitchen and bathroom. The Phoenix boasts a 24-hour concierge, valet parking, curated amenity space, including a state-of-the-art fitness center and weight room, a resident lounge with event space, a conference room, a bike storage room, and a spacious outdoor terrace with stunning views. Additional amenities include a full-service restaurant (Tir Na Nog Irish Bar and Grill), Starbucks, WSFS Bank, and a recently announced grab-and-go mart on the concourse level. The Phoenix is situated near some of the finest parks, restaurants, and shopping Philadelphia has to offer, with City Hall and Dilworth Park directly across the street. It is conveniently located with elevator access to Suburban Station and minutes from major thoroughfares I-95 and I-76. Tenant responsible for utilities. One-time move-in/move-out fee of $400. Valet parking and storage available for additional fees.
1600-18 Arch St #1010

description:

title: Looking for a spacious modern home centrally located to center city
description:
Looking for a spacious modern home centrally located to center city and surrounding areas. Blocks away from award winning restaurants and theatres. This stunning 4 floor townhome with over 3,000 square feet of livable space offers an open concept great outdoor space with a patio off the kitchen and a deck off the hallway on 3rd floor, which gives an amazing view of the center city skyline. The interior of the home has 5 bedrooms , 4.5 bathrooms and finished basemen and 2 car garage with additional storage. The entrance to the home is accessed from a private walk -way off of 15th St. or from the garage . Step inside and you are greeted by luxurious amenities and stylish finishes . The foyer is nicely tiled with to the left is a full bedroom and bath , closet , entrance to basement and access to the garage. Walk up the stairs to the 2nd floor where you are greeted with an open floor plan of your main living space which consist of your living room, gourmet kitchen with beautiful black quartz counter tops and backsplash, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher , refrigerator ,walk-in pantry, formal dining room, powder room and patio. Head upstairs to the 3rd floor where you will find the master suite with an amazing walk- in closet 4 piece bathroom, soaking tub, stall shower, double vanity, dual flush toilet and two windows to take in the bright natural light of the sun. At the rear of the hallway sits bedroom #3. Head up to the 4th floor and you will find two more bedrooms and a hall bath, laundry room , storage space and deck that over looks the center city skyline. The basement is fully finished with full bathroom , very high ceilings, great for entertaining, gym or private living quarters. The two car garage has two entrances one leading directly into foyer and one that leads to basement. Truly a must see!

title: just steps from Schuylkill River Trail and fabulous dog park!
description:
Welcome home! This is an opportunity to rent in the desirable Locust Point complex, in the Greenfield School Catchment... just steps from Schuylkill River Trail and fabulous dog park(s), community gardens, and Markward Playground. Jump at this chance to rent a 2 bed 1 bath apartment with a large additional storage space AND optional garage parking! Enter unit 206 to high ceilings, recessed/overhead lighting and unique baseboard built-ins. En route to the living quarters you'll pass an over-sized coat closet, and in-unit washer/dryer. Before slipping into the bedrooms, visit the beautifully updated kitchen with granite counter tops and ample bar seating. Notice that the kitchen is open to the large living area, with room for both dining and lounging. Included in this space is a custom desk nook for work or storage. Spend some time looking out your stylish double-high windows at the Schuylkill River or people watch the adjoining Schuylkill trail. When you're ready for some privacy, simply close the custom blinds or recede to one of the bedrooms. The primary features high ceilings, double-wide closet and a river view with abundant natural light- while the second bedroom has recessed lighting carried through. Both bedrooms contain custom closet organizers and new carpet for a softer feel. The bathroom features a removable shower head that is friendly for all heights. (Optional assigned parking spot available for additional $400/mo). With a freshly updated sleek resident lounge, outdoor patio, resident-only small-dog park AND gym- this unit is a must-see!
2429-41 Locust St #206

title: Enjoy Logan Square's convenience and contemporary styling!
description:
Enjoy Logan Square's convenience and contemporary styling in this expansive two-bedroom, two-bathroom condominium with a private balcony and parking in Center City. Spanning 1,264 square feet, this lovely sun-splashed condo invites you inside with a gracious tiled foyer lined by three extra-large closets. Ahead, the corner living room provides a generous footprint for seating and dining areas alongside southern and western exposures and a private balcony with iconic skyline views. Chefs will love the windowed eat-in kitchen featuring rows of wood cabinetry, granite counters, a breakfast bar, and a fleet of stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher and built-in microwave. The desirable split-bedroom layout includes a serene primary suite with a large walk-in closet and an en suite bathroom. Near the entry, a spacious secondary bedroom offers easy access to the full second bathroom. Three zoned HVAC and an in-unit washer-dryer add comfort and convenience. This rental includes a large storage unit and one assigned parking space. 2201 Cherry Street is a pet-friendly, elevator condominium in the centrally located Logan Square neighborhood, surrounded by the best of Philadelphia living. Enjoy fantastic shopping, dining, nightlife, and entertainment venues in every direction. Visit the city's renowned Parkway Museum District institutions, or amble along the Schuylkill River Trail to Boathouse Row. You'll find Trader Joe's and GIANT nearby, while Penn, Drexel, and Rittenhouse Square are just minutes away. The 22nd Street trolley station, SEPTA Suburban Station, 30th Street Station, and Schuylkill Expressway are all within blocks, providing easy access to the rest of the city and beyond. *Photos are from when the unit was previously staged.
2201 Cherry St #502

title: Well maintained and elegant 3BD/2.5BTH House for rent
description: Well maintained and elegant 3 level Townhome in an ideal location! 5 Minutes driving distance to North Whales train station where you can take the direct train to Jefferson Station, Philadelphia in approximately 40 min. Super convenient to everything all stores and businesses(Costco, Whole foods, Montgomery Mall, Home depot, Restaurants, AMC Movie Theater, walking distance to International Fresh Markets etc.) Highly rated North Penn School District! The ceramic tiled entry foyer will welcome you to the first level of the home where you will find a bright room (which adds additional living space/multi-functional room) and sliders to a private fenced garden-like patio. The laundry and storage area are also on this level. One car garage. On the main level is a spacious formal living room separated by two decorative pillars from the dining room. A newly renovated bright Eat-In- kitchen with all new countertop and appliance inside. Built in microwave, new dishwasher, GD, Gas range and white oak cabinetry. The powder room is located on this floor as well. The chair rail, chandelier and clean new paint make this truly high quality. Upstairs are 3 bedrooms for whole families. The main bedroom has a cathedral ceiling and a ceramic tiled bath with walk-in closets. There are two more bedrooms each with closets and a ceramic tiled hall bath. This home shows true pride of ownership. Make your move today!

title: Great One Bedroom for a Early Aug Move In
description:
Check out this one-bedroom for an early Aug move-in. Located a few blocks from Rittenhouse Square, shopping, dining,
U Arts, public transportation and so much more.
Cats and dogs are welcome with a $250 pet fee.
One month in security takes the unit off the market along with a $40, full first month's rent due at move-in (the second month would be prorated if the move-in date is not the 1st of the month).
To qualify, you need a 660 or higher credit score and to show 3 times the monthly rent amount is gross income.
For documentation, we would accept the following.
2 most recent pay stubs, must have your name on them and the company name, job offer letter, a letter from your employer on letterhead stating your annual or monthly gross income
Or we would accept a bank statement with funds to cover the year's rent (12 x the monthly rent amount =). Please note screenshots normally do not have the name.
Cosigners are also accepted that meet the same credit requirements and can show 4 times the monthly rent amount in gross income or have funds in the bank to cover two years’ rent.

title: Amazing and rarely offered tri-level condominium in a boutique buildin
description: Amazing and rarely offered tri-level condominium in a boutique building with four stories, 19 units and a fantastic shared roof deck for residents. Step into the first floor which features a bright and airy living room with handsome hardwood floors, a sparkling kitchen with wood cabinetry, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances and a ceramic tiled floor. A few steps up the spiral staircase to the spacious and light-filled bedroom (big enough for a king size bed) with great closet space and a completely renovated bathroom with glass enclosed shower stall with white subway tile and black accents. The laundry is located on this floor. The lower level is a bonus flex room which could be an additional living space/ or large office space with beautiful Pergo flooring and recessed lighting plus a separate exit to the hallway. This condominium is in perfect condition and beautifully appointed throughout. There is a private storage space (#5) and a separate bicycle room in the lower level. A walker’s and biker’s paradise. Walk score 99. This boutique building is located along Antique Row and steps away from Louis Khan Park, Seger Dog Park, Whole Foods
